Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around King Guz, his near-drowning experience, and the subsequent conflict arising from a past debt, revealing a potential deception.

sub_scenes.title: Drowning and Debt Accusation
sub_scenes.description: King Guz's apparent drowning leads to a rescue, followed by a confrontation about an unpaid debt, and suspicion about the drowning's authenticity.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Tree-Bumping and Dinosaur Trade
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's dinosaur, Bronto, and his unusual behavior, leading to consideration of trading him in for a newer model at Honest Zog's dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Bumping Issue and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: Bronto's repeated tree-bumping is diagnosed as old age, prompting Alley Oop to consider a dinosaur trade-in and visit Honest Zog's dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Dinosaur Deal
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop test drives a new dinosaur, experiences a mishap, but still secures a deal, while his old dinosaur shows sadness.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Old Pal and New Dinosaur Journey
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop bids farewell to his old dinosaur 'Pal', reflects on his decision, and starts a journey with his new, smaller dinosaur 'Dinny', while 'Pal' is priced for sale.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales and Identity Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases a dinosaur sales interaction that goes awry, leading to a bumpy ride, a fall, and a surprising identity reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: A dinosaur sales pitch leads to a test ride that becomes bumpy, culminating in a fall and an unexpected identity revelation.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Dinny's mistreatment by a caveman, his escape, and the subsequent chase, highlighting a recurring pattern of escape.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Chase
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated and harassed, leading to his escape and a chase involving children, suggesting this is a common occurrence.

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Trip and Relationship Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays Alley's failed attempt to invite Cooola fishing, leading to a relationship conflict and a sudden, possibly supernatural, consequence.

sub_scenes.title: Failed Fishing Invitation and Argument
sub_scenes.description: Alley's fishing invitation to Cooola is rejected, leading to an argument about him taking her for granted, culminating in a bizarre rock-falling incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing and Noise Complaints
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around fishing, noise disturbances caused by a noisy caveman, and the subsequent confrontation and resolution among fishermen.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Disturbance and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Noise from a caveman baiting his hook disturbs other fishermen, leading to complaints and a request for silence, with a humorous comparison to women's noise.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Observation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a scenario of romantic rivalry where Oola is suspected of pursuing another man's woman, leading to observation and eventual confirmation of flirtatious behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Suspicion arises that Oola is trying to woo another man's woman, leading to disbelief, invitation to observe, visual confirmation, and finally, overt flirtation.

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy and Romantic Choice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays a jealous outburst and physical attack, followed by the woman's clarification of her affections and romantic choice.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Fight and Romantic Preference
sub_scenes.description: A muscular caveman attacks a redhead out of jealousy, but the woman clarifies her affection is for the redhead, leading to romantic acceptance and jealous rejection.

Major_Arcs.title: Romance Strategy and Backfire
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the muscular caveman's attempt to use 'romance' as a strategy to win back Cherie, leading to a comedic botanical blunder and romantic backfire.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Strategy and Failed Mimicry
sub_scenes.description: The muscular caveman learns about 'romance' and attempts to mimic Koko's romantic gestures, resulting in a disastrous encounter with a crocodile and a squashed reptile.

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy, Attack, and Finger-Bite Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into a flashback revealing the muscular man's jealous nature, leading to an outdoor confrontation, an unexpected attack, and a humorous misunderstanding about a finger bite.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Flashback and Finger-Bite Comedy
sub_scenes.description: A flashback shows the muscular man's jealousy, followed by a possessive dialogue, an outdoor accusation, an attack by a hairy creature, and a funny revelation that a 'cannibal' attack was just an accidental finger bite during a kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: Marital Troubles and Romantic Turnaround
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents various scenarios of marital conflict, infidelity accusations, and a contrasting romantic turnaround where Alley decides to become more romantic.

sub_scenes.title: Marital Spats and Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of marital conflict include infidelity accusations, a club-wielding wife attacking her husband, and a woman forcefully leading a man home.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic New Leaf and Hand Kiss
sub_scenes.description: In contrast to marital spats, Alley and Oola reconcile, and Alley decides to become romantic, demonstrating this with a hand kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Men's Puzzles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a brief interlude focusing on the bewilderment of fishing men regarding women and an unnamed annoying 'he'.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Men's Bewilderment
sub_scenes.description: Two fishing men express confusion about women, and then annoyance towards a recurring 'he', adding a layer of unresolved annoyance.

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils of the 'Twist' Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around a new dance craze, 'the twist', and its humorous consequences, including injuries from performing and even watching it.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Injuries and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: The 'twist' dance causes injuries, prompting commentary on grown-ups doing new dances, social pressure to dance, and mixed experiences with dance invitations.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons at 'Arthur Mugwump Dance Studios', leading to clumsy lessons and a comedic reveal about the instructor's true identity.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Dance Performance and its Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop performs 'the twitch' dance, faces humiliation, but the dance unexpectedly causes injuries to the viewers, overwhelming the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain and Bullfighting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel to ancient Spain for research, which veers into romantic distraction and unexpected bullfighting events.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel for Research Gone Romantic
sub_scenes.description: Scholars plan to use a time machine to get firsthand info on ancient Spain via Alley Oop, but upon checking on him, find him in a romantic embrace.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Mishap and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: A kiss request is interrupted by time machine activation which unexpectedly transports Alley Oop and Oola to the 20th century, where Wonmug assigns them a mission in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation
Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Mishap and Bullfight Entry
sub_scenes.description: Upon arriving in Spain, Alley-Oop attempts a serenade which goes wrong, leading to intervention, a mistaken attack on a famous matador, and Alley-Oop unexpectedly entering a bullfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfight and Return
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop enters the bullfight arena as an unconventional matador, defeats the bull with a hammer, returns to the lab, and faces jealousy over a promised kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Kingship Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', leading to a temporary kingship, misinterpretations of respect, and chaotic consequences for the temporary king.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and Temporary King Appointment
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, leading to a challenge about the ease of kingship and the appointment of a temporary king.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Respect and Temporary Kingship Chaos
sub_scenes.description: The crowned king departs, instructing respect for the temporary king, which is ironically misinterpreted as rock-throwing, leading to chaos and the original king's return to power.

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic and Kingly Troubles of Temporary King
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the temporary king's domestic troubles with Queen Oompa and his experiences dealing with disputes as a temporary ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Domestic Troubles with Queen Oompa
sub_scenes.description: The temporary King Guz mistakes ulcer pills for bon-bons and faces Queen Oompa's wrath over dirty feet, experiencing domestic discipline.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification
Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

sub_scenes.title: Disputes and Wise King's Justice
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king encounters dual disputes, including one over found clams, which is resolved by a wise caveman revealing the true owner.

sub_scenes.title: King's Troubles - Chaos, Finance, and Food
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king deals with outdoor chaos, financial frustrations with an advisor, and displeasure with a meal that aggravates his ulcer.

sub_scenes.title: King's Diet, Regret, and Violent Reaction
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king's diet is enforced due to his ulcer, leading to job regret and a violent reaction to a servant's playful interruption.

Major_Arcs.title: Rulership Relief and Strange Duck Measurement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents contrasting scenarios: relief from rulership and an offer to become ruler, alongside a bizarre scene of measuring 6 feet for a 'Strange Duck'.

sub_scenes.title: Royalty and Rulership Changes
sub_scenes.description: A caveman apologizes for tripping another, an ex-ruler expresses relief, and another caveman is offered rulership, showing shifts in power dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: A peculiar scene involving cavemen measuring 6 feet near a 'Strange Duck' sign, the purpose of which is unclear, adding a whimsical element.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Prophecy and Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts romantic anticipation based on a prophecy with the harsh reality of forced shaving for the 'handsome, bearded stranger'.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy and Shaving Interruption
sub_scenes.description: A woman excitedly recounts a romantic prophecy, but the prophesied 'handsome, bearded stranger' is abruptly subjected to forced shaving, humorously undermining the romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time machine experiment that goes wrong, resulting in a Roman soldier appearing instead of 'Oop' and the machine malfunctioning.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Mishap
sub_scenes.description: A man attempts to use a time machine to bring 'Oop' to the present, but instead, a Roman soldier materializes, and the machine malfunctions.
